Subject: Sparks of Destiny ATTN: All
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=35280091
X-Yahoo-Profile: cycodrone

Shadimus knew that his best chance against Unicron was
to assemble the finest warrios from across time to
defeat the chaos bringer. Casting his mind back to the
past, there were several choices, both Autobot and
Decepticons. The first and most obvious choice was
Bludgeon- his mastery of the martial arts combined
with his warrior's steely determination, made him a
natural choice. Then there was Grimlock, his power and
fierce battle skill made him a natural. However, he
was in for a surprise with what he was shwon next- the
image of a maximal gestalt- a form shared by the
original sliverbolt, prowl and ironhide, whose spark
would consist of noone less than the legendary Ultra
Magnus himself (namely Magnaboss). Next up he decided
on Skyfire, Carnivac, and Hardhead.  Primus had two
more surprises in store for him though- one was a
warrior whose small size had never deterred his
courage, and who while becoming gloomy in his later
years, was the embodiment of the spirit of an Autobot
another champion- one he and Alpha Trion had restored
so long ago- one who'd fought the Decepticons and
saved many an Autobot life, and who would come to
touch the lives of so many, a warrior among the
Autobots withought equal: the legendary Optimus Prime
himself.

"Primus, have them briefed and reformed in their most
optimised forms and have them meet me outside the Ark-
we haven't much time."

The form of Primus smiled a wide and beaming grin.

"You have chosen wisely my child- they shall join you
shortly."

With that, Shadimus felt something wierd happen inside
him, as he saw the Primus in the Matrix, fly binside
him and assimilate itself, before suddenyly finding
himself in the present day. Shadimus sat for a minute,
dazed and confused, getting his bearings back before
slowly rising, feeling very light headed as he did so.
